string.value: The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 wants you to help him eliminate some monsters that have been taking over the harbor. Specifically, 50 Overlord A and 40 Overlord B monsters.
The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 asked you to help him eliminate some monsters, so you eliminated Overlord A and Overlord B monsters.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 72,000\r\nCan participate in the "Shelter Key" quest.\r\n
It's dangerous here. Please go somewhere safer. A bunch of unidentifiable monsters appeared and took over the harbor.\r\n#L0##bWould you like me to help you?#l\n#k

Would you? I'm trying to eliminate the monsters that have taken over the harbor, but they outnumber me and I don't know if I can handle all of them on my own. Would you help me eliminate these monsters?
If you can, please eliminate 50 Overlord A's and 40 Overlord B's while I evacuate the people.
It's dangerous here. Please get yourself to the nearest shelter where it's safe. Hurry!
How did it go?\r\n#b#L0#I took care of the monsters as you requested.#l\n#k
Thank you. Thank you so much for your hard work. Thanks to you, the people at the harbor were able to evacuate safely.
Please eliminate 50 Overlord A's and 40 Overlord B's while I evacuate everyone. Please help us. Hurry!
